title: Axis Mobile
technologyUsed: This is an Android app which involves Java and XML, it consumes the data coming from the Axis Mobile API
description: This app was created to replace an aging Windows Mobile version with a newer android version.

title: Axis Mobile API
technologyUsed: This was created using a WCF Service Library placed inside a Windows Service.  It was written in C# and communicates with a SQL database running on the server.
description: This was created as the server side for Axis Mobile, it connected to a SQL Database and sent and received JSON data between the Android App
